comments:
3.1M7 test build, observed on solaris-motif and hpux, haven't tried elsewhere

- run eclipse
- show the Error Log view
- invoke menu item Help->Welcome to show the welcome page
- now make the welcome page go away, and you'll see lots of errors in the error 
log view that look like:
